roleset.name: to deceive or trick
roleset.note: FOOL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'fool' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from fool.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: [Trompe l'oeil painting]-1 is meant [*-1]to fool the eye , but Robert Lawrence Trotter , 35 , of Kennett Square , Pa. , took his fooling seriously .

roleset.name: to engage in idle or frivolous activity

example.name: automatically generated
example.text: Jeffrey Tarter , editor of SoftLetter , a Watertown , Mass. , industry newsletter , says : `` I 've seen a lot of people fooling around on the fringes of filtering information .
example.arg: on the fringes of filtering information
